snippet: The number is one-third higher than in any other year, with 14 people, on average, drowning in the sea every day in 2016, the United Nations said....
lead_paragraph: The number is one-third higher than in any other year, with 14 people, on average, drowning in the sea every day in 2016, the United Nations said.

headline.main: ‘Worst Annual Death Toll Ever’: Mediterranean Claims 5,000 Migrants
headline.print_headline: Deadliest Year for Migrants Crossing Mediterranean
